item.title: An autobiography by chatGPT-3
item.description: “chatGPT chatGPT chatGPT“ The buzz around the tech world is so noisy that, by now, you probably heard of or played with chatGPT. When I started to learn more about chatGPT and was thinking how chatGPT-3 can help me in my day-to-day life. Well, I am a Software Engineer and hate writing engineering documents. A thought splash in my mind, “Hey, why don’t we ask chatGPT to do the work for me?
